subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Mets catcher Travis d’Arnaud will miss at least three weeks with a broken finger. His replacement, Kevin Plawecki, will have to run a major league game without ever having played one.
snippet: Mets catcher Travis d’Arnaud will miss at least three weeks with a broken finger. His replacement, Kevin Plawecki, will have to run a major league game without ever having played one.
